name: hsgui
description: HSGUI - Helper Script GUI для управления Creality 3D-принтерами

scripts.release:win: npm run dist:win && echo 'Windows release готов в папке dist/'
scripts.release:linux: npm run dist:linux && echo 'Linux release готов в папке dist/'
scripts.release:mac: npm run dist:mac && echo 'macOS release готов в папке dist/'
scripts.release:all: npm run dist:win && npm run dist:linux && npm run dist:mac && echo 'Все релизы готовы в папке dist/'
scripts.github:release: node -e "const os=require('os'); const script=os.platform()==='win32'?'scripts/github-release.bat':'scripts/github-release.sh'; require('child_process').exec(script, (err,stdout,stderr)=>{console.log(stdout); if(err)console.error(stderr); process.exit(err?1:0);});"

author: Creality Helper Team
